title: Tasty Baked Baked Murgh ( Chicken ) Badami Kebab Recipe
content:
Delicious badam chicken which is baked to perfection and is finger-licking good. This not only tastes amazing but is super succulent.

 

Baked Badam Chicken Kebab Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 45 mins

Total time: 55 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 6 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - 1 kg cut into pieces

Badam - 50 grams

Cream - ¼ cup

Kasuri methi leaves - 2 tablespoon

Green chilies - 6

Mint leaves - 1 cup

Coriander leaves - 1 cup

Ginger Garlic Paste - 2 tablespoon

Curd / Yogurt - ¼ cup

Salt to taste

Black Pepper to taste

Lemon Juice - 4 tablespoon

Oil - ¼ cup

 

Instructions

Make deep slashes on chicken.

Grind all ingredients together to a smooth paste

Pour over chicken and mix well. Leave to marinate for at least 4 hours or overnight.

Arrange in a baking tray and bake for 45 mins. Flip in between and continue baking,

Serve it hot.

recommendations.title: Tasty Thai Sausage Fried Rice Recipe
recommendations.content:
Thai Sausage Fried Rice Recipe is one of the easiest and tastiest recipes you could ever make with leftover rice.  You are definitely going to love my schezwan fried rice.
Fried rice is not only delicious to eat but it makes a perfect lunch box recipe too.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
